column4: anyone help me. my epson stylus cx2900 doesn't have a driver available in ubuntu. I tried using the driver for cx1500 and cx3100 but to no avail. anyone help me please to finally get my printer working?
my printer doesn't have a driver available in ubuntu. I tried using other drivers of the same manufacturer but to no avail. how can i finally get my printer working?
i need help. i found a driver for my printer on google but i can't install it. please help me install this file, pipslite-cups-1.0.0-1.i386.rpm
rpm's aint gonna work in ubuntu
how about this file? pipslite-1.0.0.tar.gz
gunzip/untar and and read the README
i said earlier, untar/gunzip and read README
is untar/gunzip a program? im sorry im an ubuntu noob. hehe
tar -xvzf <file name?
pardon please, i don't know what you mean
in the command prompt aka shell type the command with that file name
i typed tar xvzf pipslite-1.0.0.tar.gz in terminal but it says no such file or directory
are you in the same directory as the file
how do i know if i'm in the same directory as the file?
type ls and check if the file name is lsited
thanks, i already moved the tar in the directory. and already did the tar xvzf stuff. is it already installed after that?
nope
type less README
why is it when i type my password for su, it doesn;t recognize?
su is not enabled by default
use sudo
why is it when i type make during my installation it says No targets specified and no makefile found.  Stop.
